item.title: Transforms
item.description: Now that you understand vectors, we can move on to the next important topic. 2D Transforms In 2D space, we’re using the familiar X-Y coordinate plane. Remember that in Godot, as in most computer graphics, the Y axis points downward: Consider this spaceship floating in space: Currently, the ship is pointing in the same direction as the X axis. If we wanted it to move forward, we could just add to its X coordinate: position += Vector2(10, 0).
